dynamic_line.yes: How did a woman like you make it past the guards, did you have to kill them or something?
dynamic_line.no: How did a man like you make it past the guards, did you have to shoot them?

responses.text: So what's it like being in this labor camp?
I can't stand the smell of you dark hairs, you deserve everything that's coming to you and your wretched people!

dynamic_line.yes: It's awful, imagine the worst tedium and labor of your life and then imagine something even worse than that. Every day we mine ragnite for the empire, and are only given scraps to sustain ourselves.
dynamic_line.no: It's awful, imagine the worst tedium and labor of your life and then imagine something even worse than that. Every day we mine ragnite for the empire, and are only given scraps to sustain ourselves.

dynamic_line.yes: I've had enough of you! First the Empire, and now you?.
dynamic_line.no: I've had enough of you! First the Empire, and now you?
